_sText:
:D This started as a joke of making a pig statue for a prefab, Uberkirsche gave me the idea but you don't want to know how. So it's just a big pig, buildings on either side of it and a lake infront / behind it. There's a slide going down from his snout and one from his ass. There's also a small ramp on his back that you can use as a launcher to launch you to the lake infront of him. So basically, its an all out knife fight where you can run in so many ways.

*Note* Piggy crushed a gas tank and it's on fire. :)


<object width="425" height="355"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/x9GA21mbTc0&rel=1"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/x9GA21mbTc0&rel=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="355"></embed></object>



*NOTE2* This is just a beta, I will be releasing another version with better water, fill in the empty space by the 2 lakes, add more cubemaps, possibly make it bigger and restyle it for an aim map and / or use w/e ideas you come up with for me. So please, PLEASE give me some feedback to work with.
